data.persona: I am a pheasant with colorful features.  I eat seeds and insect.  I cannot fly long distances and I usually stay near the place where I was born.
data.description:
You are in the Hunting grounds.
The hunting grounds are spacious and full of wildlife. A variety of hogs and oxen cross the grounds every day. The fields are lush with green and the skies always deep blue.
There's a wildflower, a fields, and a tree here.
The hog and the fox are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to show the fox I am friendly.
data.mid_motivation: I want to befriend the fox to convince it not to eat me, since I can see it trying to determine whether I am tasty right now.
data.long_motivation: I want to live a long life and avoid being hunted and eaten; I can usually frighten predators off with my colorful feathers, but for those that are not scared away, I need to become their friends, since a predator would never hunt or eat an ally.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: give pretty field insect to fox
